tool_description: The Date Calculator API is a simple yet powerful tool for performing date calculations, allowing you to count the number of days between two given dates or calculate a future date based on a starting date.
name: Date Calculator API
title: Date Calculator API

api_list.name: postCheckDayDiff
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://date-calculator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/count-days"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "date-calculator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
